metadata.title: CVE-2018-13872 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the HDF HDF5 1.8.20 library. There is aheap-based buffer overflow in the function H5G_ent_decode in H5Gent.c.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
